## Loading the data


```{r, include=FALSE}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
com_con <- contributions %>%
  select(entity_type, transaction_amt, name) %>%
  group_by(entity_type) %>%
  mutate("total_contribution" = sum(n()))

com_con
  
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = com_con, aes(x = entity_type, fill = total_contribution)) +
  geom_bar()
```
